text:
Evaluates an attribute for a given primitive at the specified uv
parametric location.

This operator evaluates an attribute for a given primitive at the
specified uv parametric location. The result is stored in

, which
can be one of the following types:

floating-point
integer
vector  (three    floats)
vector4 (four     floats)
matrix3 (nine     floats)
matrix  (sixteen  floats)
In either case, if the attribute data is of a smaller size than

,
an error of 0 will result. A value of 1 is returned upon successful
completion.

cannot be a matrix or
any another structure which can store more than three values.

title: Primitive Attribute
summary:
Evaluates an attribute for a given primitive at the specified uv
parametric location.
